NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Big East’s Connecticut will play Cincinnati in the Round of 32, but with a record 11 teams in the N.C.A.A. tournament, an early clash between league teams was inevitable.
snippet: The Big East’s Connecticut will play Cincinnati in the Round of 32, but with a record 11 teams in the N.C.A.A. tournament, an early clash between league teams was inevitable.
